22 #include "mutation++.h"
23 #include "Configuration.h"

25 #include <catch.hpp>

33 
37 TEST_CASE("Parsing species name with SpeciesNameFSM", "[thermodynamics]")
38 {
39  SpeciesNameFSM sm;
40 
41  CHECK(sm.parse("e-"));
42  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().size() == 1);
43  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("e-")->second == 1);
44 
45  CHECK(sm.parse("ABC"));
46  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().size() == 3);
47  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("A")->second == 1);
48  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("B")->second == 1);
49  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("C")->second == 1);
50 
51  CHECK(sm.parse("ABC+"));
52  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().size() == 4);
53  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("A")->second == 1);
54  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("B")->second == 1);
55  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("C")->second == 1);
56  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("e-")->second == -1);
57 
58  CHECK(sm.parse("A-"));
59  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().size() == 2);
60  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("A")->second == 1);
61  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("e-")->second == 1);
62 
63  CHECK(sm.parse("AaBbCc"));
64  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().size() == 3);
65  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("Aa")->second == 1);
66  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("Bb")->second == 1);
67  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("Cc")->second == 1);
68 
69  CHECK(sm.parse("Aa1B3Cc1++"));
70  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().size() == 4);
71  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("e-")->second == -2);
72  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("Aa")->second == 1);
73  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("B")->second == 3);
74  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("Cc")->second == 1);
75 
76  CHECK(sm.parse("C6H5OH+"));
77  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().size() == 4);
78  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("e-")->second == -1);
79  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("C")->second == 6);
80  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("H")->second == 6);
81  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().find("O")->second == 1);
82 
83  CHECK_FALSE(sm.parse(""));
84  CHECK_FALSE(sm.parse(" "));
85  CHECK_FALSE(sm.parse("23A"));
86  CHECK_FALSE(sm.parse("!e#5Hz"));
87  CHECK_FALSE(sm.parse("Aaa"));
88  CHECK_FALSE(sm.parse("A+B"));
89 
90  CHECK(sm.stoichiometry().size() == 0);
91 }
92 
93 
98 TEST_CASE("Initialization of Species objects", "[thermodynamics]")
99 {
100  const double mw_N = 0.0140067;
101  const double mw_O = 0.0159994;
102  const double mw_e = 0.000000548579903;
103 
104  // Initialize from species name
105  CHECK_NOTHROW(Species("NO2+"));
106  Species s("NO2+");
107  CHECK(s.charge() == 1);
108  CHECK(s.groundStateName() == "NO2+");
109  CHECK(s.isIon());
110  CHECK(s.level() == 0);
111  CHECK(s.molecularWeight() == mw_N + 2*mw_O - mw_e);
112  CHECK(s.nAtoms("N") == 1);
113  CHECK(s.nAtoms("O") == 2);
114  CHECK(s.nAtoms("e-") == -1);
115  CHECK(s.nAtoms() == 3);
116  CHECK(s.name() == "NO2+");
117  CHECK(s.phase() == GAS);
118  CHECK(s.stoichiometry()[0] == std::make_pair(std::string("N"), 1));
119  CHECK(s.stoichiometry()[1] == std::make_pair(std::string("O"), 2));
120  CHECK(s.stoichiometry()[2] == std::make_pair(std::string("e-"), -1));
121  CHECK(s.type() == MOLECULE);
122 
123  // Assignment operator and initialize from name + phase
124  CHECK_NOTHROW(s = Species("O", SOLID));
125  CHECK(s.charge() == 0);
126  CHECK(s.groundStateName() == "O");
127  CHECK_FALSE(s.isIon());
128  CHECK(s.level() == 0);
129  CHECK(s.molecularWeight() == mw_O);
130  CHECK(s.nAtoms("O") == 1);
131  CHECK(s.nAtoms() == 1);
132  CHECK(s.name() == "O");
133  CHECK(s.phase() == SOLID);
134  CHECK(s.stoichiometry()[0] == std::make_pair(std::string("O"), 1));
135  CHECK(s.type() == ATOM);
136 
137  // Assignment and initialize from name + phase + stoichiometry
138  CHECK_NOTHROW(s = Species(
139  "Nitrogen Ion", GAS, Species::StoichList()("N", 1)("e-", -1)));
140  CHECK(s.charge() == 1);
141  CHECK(s.groundStateName() == "Nitrogen Ion");
142  CHECK(s.isIon());
143  CHECK(s.level() == 0);
144  CHECK(s.molecularWeight() == mw_N - mw_e);
145  CHECK(s.nAtoms("N") == 1);
146  CHECK(s.nAtoms("e-") == -1);
147  CHECK(s.nAtoms() == 1);
148  CHECK(s.name() == "Nitrogen Ion");
149  CHECK(s.phase() == GAS);
150  CHECK(s.stoichiometry()[0] == std::make_pair(std::string("N"), 1));
151  CHECK(s.stoichiometry()[1] == std::make_pair(std::string("e-"), -1));
152  CHECK(s.type() == ATOM);
153 
154  // Copy constructor
155  s = Species(s);
156  CHECK(s.charge() == 1);
157  CHECK(s.groundStateName() == "Nitrogen Ion");
158  CHECK(s.isIon());
159  CHECK(s.level() == 0);
160  CHECK(s.molecularWeight() == mw_N - mw_e);
161  CHECK(s.nAtoms("N") == 1);
162  CHECK(s.nAtoms("e-") == -1);
163  CHECK(s.nAtoms() == 1);
164  CHECK(s.name() == "Nitrogen Ion");
165  CHECK(s.phase() == GAS);
166  CHECK(s.stoichiometry()[0] == std::make_pair(std::string("N"), 1));
167  CHECK(s.stoichiometry()[1] == std::make_pair(std::string("e-"), -1));
168  CHECK(s.type() == ATOM);
169 
170  // Initialize level from species
171  s = Species(s, 3);
172  CHECK(s.charge() == 1);
173  CHECK(s.groundStateName() == "Nitrogen Ion");
174  CHECK(s.isIon());
175  CHECK(s.level() == 3);
176  CHECK(s.molecularWeight() == mw_N - mw_e);
177  CHECK(s.nAtoms("N") == 1);
178  CHECK(s.nAtoms("e-") == -1);
179  CHECK(s.nAtoms() == 1);
180  CHECK(s.name() == "Nitrogen Ion(3)");
181  CHECK(s.phase() == GAS);
182  CHECK(s.stoichiometry()[0] == std::make_pair(std::string("N"), 1));
183  CHECK(s.stoichiometry()[1] == std::make_pair(std::string("e-"), -1));
184  CHECK(s.type() == ATOM);
185 
186  std::stringstream ss;
187  ss << "<species name=\"N2\">\n";
188  ss << " <stoichiometry> N : 2 </stoichiometry>\n";
189  ss << "</species>";
190 
191  // Initialize from XML
192  CHECK_NOTHROW(s = Species(Utilities::IO::XmlElement(ss.str())));
193  CHECK(s.charge() == 0);
194  CHECK(s.groundStateName() == "N2");
195  CHECK_FALSE(s.isIon());
196  CHECK(s.level() == 0);
197  CHECK(s.molecularWeight() == 2*mw_N);
198  CHECK(s.nAtoms("N") == 2);
199  CHECK(s.nAtoms() == 2);
200  CHECK(s.name() == "N2");
201  CHECK(s.phase() == GAS);
202  CHECK(s.stoichiometry()[0] == std::make_pair(std::string("N"), 2));
203  CHECK(s.type() == MOLECULE);
204 
205  CHECK_THROWS_AS(Species("N+O"), InvalidInputError);
206  CHECK_THROWS_AS(Species("AbN2"), InvalidInputError);
207 }
